version_description:
*All gun upgrades have been automatically converted to appropriate levels in the new gun level system!*

- New character, new weapon, and new items! 
- Now you can level up your characters to boost their stats!
- Added single-player tutorial (see new game progression below)
- Items are now available for sale in Shop and can be brought into battle!
- Improved Map interface 
- Co-op games are now easier to join. 
- Added super-value IAP packs 

--New Game Progression--
Day 2 - Unlock the Shop 
Day 6 - Unlock consumable items 
Day 8 - Unlock co-op mode 
Day 10 - Unlock VS mode 
Day 20 - Unlock boss mode

★★★★★ 

▶ http://twitter.com/TRINITIgames 
▶ http://facebook.com/TRINITIgames

- New character, new weapon and new items
- Added dinosaurs
- New boss: Velociraptor
- Optimized co-op mode

• Fix the bug that game will be crashed after  choosing the characters of Call of Mini™ Zombies 2

http://twitter.com/TRINITIgames
http://facebook.com/TRINITIgames

Trinit Interactive 10th Anniversary, ALL IAP FREE!

For 10 years, Triniti Interactive Studios have published 150 games on mobile platform. Out of gratitude for your long support, we decided to bring the most popular games in the past back on the AppStore. What’s more, All in-app purchases of these games are now free! In other words, all players can enjoy the full content of the games for free!
Have a good time and enjoy!

See the list below:

Call of Mini™ Zombies
Call of Mini™ Zombies 2
Call of Mini™ DinoHunter
Call of Mini: Sniper
Call of Mini™ Brawler
TinyLegends™ Heroes
TinyLegends™ Monster Crasher
TinyLegends™ Crazy Knight
